text: I'm following along with the CMS for developers certification and I'm trying to create a custom module as they did in the videos. I styled the module so that the list items display:inline but it doesn't seem to be doing that. Can anyone tell me why that's happening? Thanks!
If you use the field value instead of the full snippet, it will work
